entities.name: snakes
entities.description: The narrator sometimes inhabits snakes as their preferred animal to inhabit.

entities.name: wizard
entities.description: A young, foolish, and gullible wizard who wandered across the narrator's path in the forest.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The head of a school that the wizard was teaching at.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The one who thwarted the narrator's plan to steal the Sorcerer's Stone.

relationships.description: The wizard was a teacher at Dumbledore's school.
The narrator took possession of the wizard's body to supervise him closely as he carried out their orders.
Harry Potter thwarted the narrator's plan to steal the Sorcerer's Stone.
